cause.description:
This week delegates from 171 countries will be assembling in the Netherlands for a meeting of the Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species.
One of the topics being covered will be a discussion on whether China should lift its ban on the trading of tiger parts.
Even a partial lift of this ban can prove as a serious threat to the population of tigers all over the world and would eventually lead to the extinction of these magnificent creatures much sooner than expected.
I am posting a link below. Please do sign up and contribute any which way you can. Your help will be much appreciated.
http://passport.panda.org/index.cfm?uNC=63355024
1. China must be prevented from lifting its ban on the trading of tiger parts
2. Tigers deserve to be protected and their density must be restored
3. We must support WWF in their endeavour
cause.mission: Help prevent the trade in tiger parts
cause.name: Save Our Stripes
